quotes.message: Innovation accelerates and compounds. Each point in front of you is bigger than anything that ever happened.
quotes.name: Marc Andreessen

quotes.message: A spirit of innovation is generally the result of a selfish temper and confined views. People will not look forward to posterity, who never look backward to their ancestors.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Pure innovation is more gross than error.
quotes.name: George Chapman

quotes.message: Innovation is creativity with a job to do.
quotes.name: John Emmerling

quotes.message: Innovation happens because there are people out there doing and trying a lot of different things.
quotes.name: Edward Felten

quotes.message: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Innovation is taking two things that already exist and putting them together in a new way.
quotes.name: Tom Freston

quotes.message: Innovation is the calling card of the future.
quotes.name: Anna Eshoo

quotes.message: There is no innovation and creativity without failure. Period.
quotes.name: Brene Brown

quotes.message: Innovation is serendipity, so you don't know what people will make.
quotes.name: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.message: Innovation is the whim of an elite before it becomes a need of the public.
quotes.name: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.message: Innovation is moving at a scarily fast pace.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: A key ingredient in innovation is the ability to challenge authority and break rules.
quotes.name: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.message: The best way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.
quotes.name: Dr. Linus Pauling

quotes.message: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody has thought.
quotes.name: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.message: To raise new questions, new possibilities, to regard old problems from a new angle, requires creative imagination and marks real advance in science.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Once we rid ourselves of traditional thinking we can get on with creating the future.
quotes.name: James Bertrand

quotes.message: There's a way to do it better - find it.
quotes.name: Thomas Edison

quotes.message: The essential part of creativity is not being afraid to fail.
quotes.name: Edwin H. Land

quotes.message: Creativity is not the finding of a thing, but the making something out of it after it is found.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Discoveries are often made by not following instructions, by going off the main road, by trying the untried.
quotes.name: Frank Tyger

quotes.message: Innovation is the process of turning ideas into manufacturable and marketable form.
quotes.name: Watts Humprey

quotes.message: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.
quotes.name: Ken Robinson

quotes.message: A new idea is delicate. It can be killed by a sneer or a yawn; it can be stabbed to death by a quip and worried to death by a frown on the right man's brow.
quotes.name: Charles Brower

quotes.message: All great deeds and all great thoughts have a ridiculous beginning.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.name: Alan Kay

quotes.message: The more original a discovery, the more obvious it seems afterwards.
quotes.name: Arthur Koestler

quotes.message: Innovation is the ability to convert ideas into invoices.
quotes.name: L. Duncan

quotes.message: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.message: Innovation is the creation of the new or the re-arranging of the old in a new way.
quotes.name: Michael Vance

quotes.message: Get a good idea, and stay with it. Dog it, and work at it until it's done, and done right.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
quotes.name: General George Patton

quotes.message: Ideas won't keep. Something must be done about them.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.message: Innovation is all about people. Innovation thrives when the population is diverse, accepting and willing to cooperate.
quotes.name: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.message: An innovation will get traction only if it helps people get something that they're already doing in their lives done better.
quotes.name: Clayton M. Christensen

quotes.message: Predicting innovation is something of a self-canceling exercise: the most probable innovations are probably the least innovative.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: An innovation is one of those things that society looks at and says, if we make this part of the way we live and work, it will change the way we live and work.
quotes.name: Dean Kamen

quotes.message: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: When you innovate, you've got to be prepared for everyone telling you you're nuts.
quotes.name: Larry Ellison

quotes.message: For good ideas and true innovation, you need human interaction, conflict, argument, debate.
quotes.name: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.message: Innovation, being avant garde, is always polemic.
quotes.name: Ferran Adria

quotes.message: The process of innovation is, of course, never ending.
quotes.name: Alan Greenspan

quotes.message: Never before in history has innovation offered promise of so much to so many in so short a time.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: Innovation is the central issue in economic prosperity.
quotes.name: Michael Porter

quotes.message: Innovation is the ability to see change as an opportunity - not a threat.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Creativity is the ability to see relationships where none exist.
quotes.name: Thomas Disch
